title: 6 times Kylie Jenner and Stormi wore cute matching outfits
text:
6 times Kylie Jenner and Stormi wore cute matching outfits

The 22-year-old mom recently dressed Stormi in her iconic purple Met Gala look for Halloween – and it was adorable.

Kylie Jenner’s daughter Stormi is definitely her mother’s ‘mini-me’.

The 22-year-old mom recently dressed Stormi in her iconic purple Met Gala look for Halloween – and it was adorable.

Now, we’ve compiled a list of six times Kylie and Stormi have dressed up in matching outfits.

READ MORE: PIC: Stormi dressed up as Kylie for Halloween – and we can't handle it!

A few months ago, the pair looked super cute in matching blue dresses while traveling.

How can we forget these stunning matching bikinis?

Matching minis.

Ending last year in the classic black gowns.

READ MORE: Stormi's accessories and sneaker collection could help you pay off your first car - in cash with all the extras.
description: The 22-year-old mom recently dressed Stormi in her iconic purple Met Gala look for Halloween – and it was adorable.
